conbody.p: (e) The authority to make determinations under paragraphs (a), (b), (c), and (d) of FAR 14.407-3 is delegated to the COCO, without power of redelegation.
(h) The contracting officer shall maintain the records required by FAR 14.407-3(h) in the contract file.
